recipe.name: Apple Crumble
recipe.notes: The Pampered Chef claims that this and their other Small Oval Baker recipe are preparable in a toaster oven of equivalent temperature. This is probably notable in their belief that one might have a toaster oven of such quality. I suppose if you are a Pampered Chef type, you've got a quality toaster oven I suppose. As for me, I have never been so fortunate.

ingredient.preparation: cored and sliced into bite-sized chunks

recipe.preparation: Preheat the oven to 375F. Toss with sugar and cinnamon and deposit in oval or other 4 cup casserole. Microwave butter for 30-40 seconds or until melted and to it mix the flour, brown sugar, walnuts and oats to make topping. Sprinkle toping evenly over apples and cook 30-35 minutes or until apples and topping are done.
recipe.source_name: Pampered Chef, Small Oval Baker, New Traditions Collection
